meanings.definition: The quality or state of being insatiable.
meanings.sent1: Her insatiatenesses for knowledge led her to read every book in the library.
meanings.sent2: His insatiatenesses for adventure drove him to explore new lands.
meanings.sent3: The insatiatenesses of the puppy for treats was both adorable and endless.
meanings.sent4: The insatiatenesses of the ocean for ships is a dangerous allure.
meanings.sent5: The insatiatenesses of the child for toys knew no bounds.

meanings.definition: The condition of never being satisfied or fulfilled.
meanings.sent1: The insatiatenesses of his ambition kept him striving for more success.
meanings.sent2: Their insatiatenesses for wealth drove them to work tirelessly.
meanings.sent3: The insatiatenesses of the cat for attention was both amusing and demanding.
meanings.sent4: The insatiatenesses of time for moments is a reminder to cherish each one.
meanings.sent5: The insatiatenesses of the plant for sunlight was evident in its rapid growth.
